channel.title: Visage Pk!
channel.description:
[CENTER][B][SIZE=5]Visage Pk[/SIZE][/B] "Pking for the community"
Contact Info: visageforums@gmail.com Username: Inaht [TItaniumX] (Owner) Website: [url=http://www.visageforums.com]www.visageforums.com[/url] Webclient: [url=http://visageforums.com/Webclient.html]http://visageforums.com/Webclient.html[/url] Twitter: [url=https://twitter.com/Visage_Pk]https://twitter.com/Visage_Pk[/url] Youtube: Coming soon! Facebook: [url=https://www.facebook.com/visage.pk.5]https://www.facebook.com/visage.pk.5[/url]
Intro:
Visage Pk is a work in progress server where updates are constant. There is always room for improvement ad Visage Pk is always there constantly improving the server. Here at Visage Pk, our staff is friendly, social and helpful and will help you where ever you. We will try our best to keep the community happy by making sure updates are constant and server is fun and enjoyable. This is a small project a team has decided to build in our time so please bare with us if there are any situations as we use our own pocket money to fund the server.
What does Visage Pk Have?
-Full almost near perfect combat -Edgeville Pking, Green Dragons Pking etc,, -Mage Bank Pking, Duel Arena, Barrows, and more! -Up to date items (e.x Statius, Dragon Claws, etc..) -Pk Points shop (Use pk points to buy powerful weapons and armour) -100% SPAWNING ANYTHING (Except for Pk Point items) -No lag, can handle up to 500+ players easily, 24/7 Uptime -Constant updates -Friendly staff, support -Enjoyable Experience
Very soon to come:
-Webclient (May 25, 2013) -100% Working Pest Control -100% Working Castle Wars -NEW! Visage Pk Man Hunt Minigame (Our very own special minigame, hopefully by the end of June) -More Pk Points items (Please suggest them) -More Pk Zones (Varrock multi, etc..) (May 25, 2013) -Chilling Zones -100% Skilling Skills (Woodcutting, Thieving, Cooking)
Pictures: [/CENTER]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img16/3994/pkpointsvisagepk.png[/img]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img802/376/duelarenavisagepk.png[/img]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img541/4359/cursesvisagepk.png[/img]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img191/2773/barrowsvisagepk.png[/img]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img835/475/visagepkpic4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img594/6834/visagepkpic2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/041c2ca646602505d511b328eac91bbd.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/ec81cac49143d1a931d466c26c8d5560.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/da8eaa0f7b48a0b8e012cc4aaa1f50ba.png[/img]

Visage Pk is a work in progress server where updates are constant. There is always room for improvement ad Visage Pk is always there constantly improving the server. Here at Visage Pk, our staff is friendly, social and helpful and will help you where ever you. We will try our best to keep the community happy by making sure updates are constant and server is fun and enjoyable. This is a small project a team has decided to build in our time so please bare with us if there are any situations as we use our own pocket money to fund the server.

What does Visage Pk Have?

-Mage Bank Pking, Duel Arena, Barrows, and more!

-Constant updates
